content: make a set of apple coasters with my crochet apple coaster pattern it would make for a perfect crochet gift for teachers or fall decor **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream - country red ▢lily sugar n cream - hot green ▢lily sugar n cream - white ▢lily sugar n cream - warm brown ▢5mm crochet hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase
